enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from da_enterprise_property_info where 1 = 1
and id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(created_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginCreatedTime})
AND unix_timestamp(created_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endCreatedTime})
and currency LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and datasource_code = #{EntityRelated.datasourceCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and enterprise_id = #{EntityRelated.enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and flag_code = #{EntityRelated.flagCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and flag_text LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.flagText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and id = #{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(source_create_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginSourceCreateTime})
AND unix_timestamp(source_create_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endSourceCreateTime})
AND unix_timestamp(update_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginUpdateTime})
AND unix_timestamp(update_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endUpdateTime})
and update_user_id = #{EntityRelated.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by
${Order.columnName}
ASC
DESC
